verbose_text: Afterwards, PTX as a typical anticancer drug was added into the solution of 131 I-HSA at the mole ratio of 10:1 (PTX : HSA) to induce the self-assembly of HSA XREF_BIBR, forming 131 I-HSA-PTX nanoparticles.
evidence: PTX as a typical anticancer drug was added into the solution of  131 I-HSA at the mole ratio of 10:1 (PTX: HSA) to induce the self-assembly of HSA
